entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 3:54 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.3°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 7.3°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind light except northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
